  • Classes in com.mumfrey.liteloader used by com.mumfrey.liteloader 
    Class and Description
    LiteMod
    Base interface for mods
    PlayerInteractionListener.MouseButton
    Mouse buttons
    Tickable
    Interface for mods which want tick events
  • Classes in com.mumfrey.liteloader used by com.mumfrey.liteloader.api 
    Class and Description
    LiteMod
    Base interface for mods
  • Classes in com.mumfrey.liteloader used by com.mumfrey.liteloader.client 
    Class and Description
    ChatFilter
    Interface for mods which can filter inbound chat
    ChatListener
    Interface for mods which receive inbound chat
    ChatRenderListener
    Interface for mods which want to alter the chat display
    EntityRenderListener
    Interface for mods which want to receive callbacks when entities are rendered into the world.
    FrameBufferListener
    Interface for mods which want to interact with Minecraft's main Frame Buffer Object.
    GameLoopListener
    Interface for mods which want a frame notification every single game loop
    HUDRenderListener
    Interface for mods which want callbacks when the HUD is rendered
    InitCompleteListener
    Interface for mods which need to initialise stuff once the game initialisation is completed, for example mods which need to register new renderers.
    JoinGameListener
    Interface for mods which wish to be notified when the player connects to a server (or local game).
    LiteMod
    Base interface for mods
    OutboundChatFilter
    Interface for mods which want to filter outbound chat
    OutboundChatListener
    Interface for mods which want to monitor outbound chat
    PostLoginListener 
    PostRenderListener
    Render callback that gets called AFTER entities are rendered
    PreJoinGameListener
    Interface for mods which wish to be notified when the player connects to a server (or local game).
    PreRenderListener
    Render callbacks that get called before certain render events
    RenderListener
    Interface for objects which want a pre-render callback
    ScreenshotListener
    Interface for mods which want to handle or inhibit the saving of screenshots
    Tickable
    Interface for mods which want tick events
    ViewportListener 
  • Classes in com.mumfrey.liteloader used by com.mumfrey.liteloader.client.gui.modlist 
    Class and Description
    LiteMod
    Base interface for mods
  • Classes in com.mumfrey.liteloader used by com.mumfrey.liteloader.core 
    Class and Description
    LiteMod
    Base interface for mods
    PacketHandler
    Interface for mods which want to handle raw packets
    PlayerInteractionListener
    Interface for mods which want to observe the player's "interaction" status (player mouse clicks), allows block interaction events to be cancelled.
    PlayerMoveListener
    Interface for mods which want to monitor or control player movements
    PluginChannelListener
    Interface for mods which want to use plugin channels
    ServerChatFilter
    Interface for mods which can filter inbound chat
    ServerCommandProvider
    Interface for mods which provide commands to the local integrated server
    ServerPlayerListener
    Interface for mods which want to handle players joining and leaving a LAN game (or single player game)
    ServerPluginChannelListener
    Interface for mods which want to use plugin channels on the (integrated) server side.
    ServerTickable
    Interface for mods which want to be ticked on the server thread
    ShutdownListener
    Interface for mods that want to receive an event when the game is shutting down due to a user request.
  • Classes in com.mumfrey.liteloader used by com.mumfrey.liteloader.interfaces 
    Class and Description
    LiteMod
    Base interface for mods
  • Classes in com.mumfrey.liteloader used by com.mumfrey.liteloader.modconfig 
    Class and Description
    LiteMod
    Base interface for mods
  • Classes in com.mumfrey.liteloader used by com.mumfrey.liteloader.permissions 
    Class and Description
    LiteMod
    Base interface for mods
    Permissible
    Interface for mods which use the ClientPermissions system
    PluginChannelListener
    Interface for mods which want to use plugin channels
    ServerPluginChannelListener
    Interface for mods which want to use plugin channels on the (integrated) server side.
